definition: alternative name/to refer to sth by another name/antonomasia
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Oh, I thought it stands for a certain chemical substance KISS.
sentences.chinese: 哇，我還以爲那是化學上二硫碘化鉀的代稱。

sentences.english: Also used after the code name for the empress.
It was also name of supporter of Beijing underground music.
sentences.chinese: 也曾經是北京地下音樂忠實支持者的代稱。

definition: to be generally referred to (as)/generic term
lit. to put Zhang's hat on Li's head/to attribute sth to the wrong person (idiom)/to confuse one thing with another
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to spread falsehoods/to increasingly distort the truth/to pile errors on top of errors (idiom)
not the least bit concerned/completely indifferent
hard to distinguish real from imitation
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
to add parallels and interpretations (to a story etc)/to develop and embellish/to interpret (often in a strained manner)
